resources.string: Do you want to delete this note?

"Relevantly.

"
"Application for reading rss feeds.

"
"For feeds with title, link and description.

"
"Two users views:
"
"Reader
"
"For showing feeds.

"
"Sources
"
"for editing sources" "for add click on plus icon in the top toolbar 
" "for delete log click on item 

"
"Names of sources in Reader is automatic based on url of source.
"
